## ExtendedVersioningPolicy.classifyWithContext() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Optional context-aware classification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
classifyWithContext?(change: AnalyzedChange, context: PolicyContext): ReleaseType;
```

**Returns:**

[ReleaseType](./change-detector-core.releasetype.md)

The release type classification

## Remarks

If implemented, this method is preferred over `classify` when context is available. Falls back to `classify` if not implemented.
